data.comment: The match is underway in Naples.
Free kick for Napoli in their own half.
In the minute 4, Corner awarded to Napoli.
Napoli pushes forward through Piotr Zielinski, whose finish on goal is saved.
Sampdoria have been awarded a corner by Federico La Penna.
In the minute 8, Morten Thorsby (Sampdoria) strikes at Stadio Diego Armando Maradona but his header is cleared.
Fabio Quagliarella (Sampdoria) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Jakub Jankto (Sampdoria) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 11, Sampdoria have been awarded a corner by Federico La Penna.
Federico La Penna awards the home team a throw-in.
Important block from the Sampdoria defence as Piotr Zielinski fires in a strike for Napoli.
In the minute 13, Corner awarded to Napoli.
Federico La Penna signals a free kick to Napoli in their own half.
Free kick Napoli.
In the minute 16, Napoli's Lorenzo Insigne gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Sampdoria goal kick.
Throw-in for Sampdoria at Stadio Diego Armando Maradona.
In the minute 17, Sampdoria awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Goal! Sampdoria have got their heads in front thanks to a Jakub Jankto strike.
Great play from Valerio Verre to set up the goal.
In the minute 22, Sampdoria awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in Sampdoria.
Dries Mertens of Napoli is pulled up for offside.
In the minute 25, Throw-in for Napoli in their own half.
Sampdoria drive upfield and Antonio Candreva gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Napoli defender.
Sampdoria have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 27, Throw-in high up the field for Sampdoria in Naples.
Can Sampdoria capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Napoli's half?
Free kick for Napoli in the half of Sampdoria.
In the minute 32, Goal kick for Sampdoria at Stadio Diego Armando Maradona.
Sampdoria have a goal kick.
Sampdoria drive forward but Fabio Quagliarella is judged offside.
In the minute 34, Free kick for Sampdoria in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Naples.
Napoli push upfield and Dries Mertens gets his head to the ball. The attempt is cleared by an alert Sampdoria defence.
In the minute 37, Napoli awarded a free kick in their own half.
Federico La Penna signals a free kick to Napoli in their own half.
Morten Thorsby (Sampdoria) gets booked by Federico La Penna, and will miss the next match due to the number of yellow cards received this season.
In the minute 39, Napoli's Piotr Zielinski breaks free at Stadio Diego Armando Maradona. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Federico La Penna awards Sampdoria a goal kick.
Sampdoria awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 41, Ball goes out of play for a Napoli goal kick.
Sampdoria's Fabio Quagliarella is whistled for offside at Stadio Diego Armando Maradona.
Throw-in for Napoli in the half of Sampdoria.
In the minute 44, Sampdoria needs to be cautious. Napoli have an attacking throw-in.
Napoli drives forward and Lorenzo Insigne gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Corner awarded to Napoli.
In the minute 45, Matteo Politano (Napoli) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Federico La Penna signals a free kick to Napoli.
1 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Lorenzo Insigne (Napoli) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
The second half has started at Stadio Diego Armando Maradona.
Diego Demme gets his shot on target but fails to score for Napoli.
In the minute 46, The home team replace Matteo Politano with Hirving Lozano.
Napoli make their second substitution with Andrea Petagna replacing Fabian Ruiz.
In the minute 48, Throw-in for Sampdoria close to the penalty box.
Fabio Quagliarella for Sampdoria is whistled offside.
Napoli have been awarded a corner by Federico La Penna.
In the minute 51, Sampdoria's Antonio Candreva has run offside.
Federico La Penna signals a Napoli throw-in in Sampdoria's half.
In Naples a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 52, Albin Ekdal (Sampdoria) gets a yellow card.
Goal! Hirving Lozano (Napoli) levels the score at 1-1 with a header.
Dries Mertens with an assist there.
In the minute 57, Sampdoria drive forward but Antonio Candreva is judged offside.
Lorenzo Insigne for Napoli gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Sampdoria at Stadio Diego Armando Maradona.
In the minute 58, In Naples a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Federico La Penna signals a free kick to Sampdoria in their own half.
Tiemoue Bakayoko is replacing Diego Demme for Napoli at Stadio Diego Armando Maradona.
In the minute 60, Gennaro Gattuso is making the team's fourth substitution at Stadio Diego Armando Maradona with Mario Rui replacing Faouzi Ghoulam.
Napoli's Hirving Lozano fires in a great shot but is denied by the woodwork.
In Naples Napoli attack through Lorenzo Insigne. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 62, It's a goal kick for the away team in Naples.
Dries Mertens of Napoli gets in a strike, but is off target.
Federico La Penna awards Sampdoria a goal kick.
In the minute 64, Gaston Ramirez is on a sub for Valerio Verre for Sampdoria.
Napoli have been awarded a corner by Federico La Penna.
Ball safe as Sampdoria is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 66, Sampdoria have a goal kick.
Throw-in Sampdoria.
Throw-in for Napoli at Stadio Diego Armando Maradona.
In the minute 68, Goal! Napoli have taken a 2-1 lead courtesy of a header from Andrea Petagna.
Hirving Lozano instrumental with a fine assist.
Free kick for Sampdoria in the half of Napoli.
In the minute 69, Corner awarded to Sampdoria.
Sampdoria's Antonio Candreva is on target but unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Sampdoria.
In the minute 70, Maya Yoshida's header is off-target for Sampdoria.
Federico La Penna awards Napoli a goal kick.
Ball safe as Sampdoria is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 73, Federico La Penna awards the home team a throw-in.
Napoli push forward at Stadio Diego Armando Maradona and Dries Mertens gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Sampdoria defence.
Sampdoria to take a throw-in in Napoli territory.
In the minute 76, Dries Mertens of Napoli smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Napoli have been awarded a corner by Federico La Penna.
Federico La Penna signals a throw-in for Napoli, close to Sampdoria's area.
In the minute 77, The home team have replaced Piotr Zielinski with Stanislav Lobotka. This is the fifth substitution made today by Gennaro Gattuso.
Napoli have been awarded a corner by Federico La Penna.
Goal kick for Sampdoria at Stadio Diego Armando Maradona.
In the minute 79, Claudio Ranieri (Sampdoria) is making a second substitution, with Mikkel Damsgaard replacing Jakub Jankto.
Can Napoli get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sampdoria's half?
Free kick Napoli.
In the minute 81, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Can Napoli get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sampdoria's half?
Federico La Penna signals a free kick to Napoli.
In the minute 82, Omar Colley (Sampdoria) has received a first yellow card.
Free kick for Sampdoria in their own half.
Giovanni Di Lorenzo for Napoli has been booked by Federico La Penna and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 85, In Naples a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Napoli needs to be cautious. Sampdoria have an attacking throw-in.
Corner awarded to Sampdoria.
In the minute 87, Napoli awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Napoli in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Napoli in Naples.
In the minute 89, Federico La Penna signals a Napoli throw-in in Sampdoria's half.
Throw-in for Sampdoria at Stadio Diego Armando Maradona.
3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Federico La Penna signals a free kick to Napoli in their own half.
Sampdoria have a goal kick.
Federico La Penna awards the home team a throw-in.
Free kick for Napoli in their own half.
Ball safe as Sampdoria is awarded a throw-in in their half.
The second-half is over. The match ends 2-1.
Sampdoria's Gaston Ramirez has been booked in Naples.
Lorenzo Insigne (Napoli) has received a yellow card from Federico La Penna.
Mario Rui (Napoli) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
